title: Missouri National Recreational River: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices         MNRR Headquarters in Yankton, South Dakota NPS photo  Operations All park operations are based at the headquarters building in Yankton, South Dakota.   Headquarters Address: 508 E 2nd Street Yankton, SD 57078 Telephone (Staff Inquiries/Visitor Info): 605-665-0209 FAX: 605-665-4183 Office Hours: Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. The office is closed on federal holidays.  MNRR Staff The overall management of Missouri National Recreational River (MNRR) is the responsibility of the superintendent. Park staff is divided into three divisions or disciplines:  Administration Interpretation & Education Resource Management & Maintenance   Superintendent Rick Clark  Chief Administrative Officer Tina Hartz  Chief of Natural Resources Milt Haar  Biologist Lisa Yager  Biological Science Technician Brian Korman Chief of Interpretation, Education & Outreach Daniel Peterson  Park Ranger Interpretation Dugan Smith  Education Technician  Teresa Mentzer  U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service Liaison Carol Hale 605-665-0733 Fax: 605-665-4183
